item.title: Efree add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
Efree add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "Man is condemned to be free; because once thrown into the world, he is responsible for everything he does. It is up to you to give [life] a meaning." -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Efree add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Efree add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Efree add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I cannot believe in a God who wants to be praised all the time." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Efree add a quote by Tan Malaka
item.description: "Ingatlah! Bahwa dari dalam kubur, suara saya akan lebih keras daripada dari atas bumi" -- Tan Malaka

item.title: Efree add a quote by Sigmund Freud
item.description: "Religion is an illusion and it derives its strength from the fact that it falls in with our instinctual desires." -- Sigmund Freud

item.title: Efree add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "make a radical change in your lifestyle and begin to boldly do things which you may previously never have thought of doing, or been too hesitant to attempt. So many people live within unhappy circumstances and yet will not take the initiative to change their situation because they are conditioned to a life of security, conformity, and conservation, all of which may appear to give one peace of mind, but in reality nothing is more damaging to the adventurous spirit within a man than a secure future. The very basic core of a man's living spirit is his passion for adventure. The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun. If you want to get more out of life, you must lose your inclination for monotonous security and adopt a helter-skelter style of life that will at first appear to you to be crazy. But once you become accustomed to such a life you will see its full meaning and its incredible beauty." -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Efree add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "I read somewhere... how important it is in life not necessarily to be strong, but to feel strong... to measure yourself at least once." -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Efree add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Efree add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Efree add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The only difference between a suicide and a martyrdom really is the amount of press coverage." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Efree add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You are not your job, you're not how much money you have in the bank. You are not the car you drive. You're not the contents of your wallet. You are not your fucking khakis. You are all singing, all dancing crap of the world." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Efree add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When we don't know who to hate, we hate ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Efree add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "What we don't understand we can make mean anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Efree add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "That's why I write, because life never works except in retrospect. You can't control life, at least you can control your version." -- Chuck Palahniuk
